    Enumeration of how a layout element should horizontally align its content

    Base for the data element classes required for populating Microsoft Band layout elements

    Class that represents a Microsoft Band tile layout
    PagePanel
    Base class for Microsoft Band container layout elements
    PageRect
    Class that represents the x and y location of the upper left corner of a Microsoft Band layout element, relative to its parent element, as well as its width and height

    Class that represents a Microsoft Band scrollable auto-arranging container layout element
